backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, application submission, document upload, and access-controlled operations using authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a deployment fix requiring a valid domain slug and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including pages, hooks, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles at the project root.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main React script with a valid slug‑safe title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup with Internet Identity auth gating, protected routes, step guards, and page routing for the onboarding flow.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared authenticated layout providing header, branding, logout handling, page container, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor using the current identity and reinitializes dependent queries on identity changes.
React Query hook fetching the user's application status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitApplicantDet: Mutation hook sending applicant details to the backend and refreshing application status.
frontend/src/hooks/useUploadApplicationD: React Query mutation hook that uploads application documents via the actor and invalidates the applicationStatus query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and basic utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that creates the root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the app.
Form page for entering applicant details with validation, profile setup, and submission before navigating to document upload.
frontend/src/pages/ConfirmationPage.tsx: Final confirmation page showing submission success details and offering logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentUploadPage.ts: UI for selecting, tracking progress, uploading documents as ExternalBlobs, and redirecting on success.
frontend/src/pages/LoginRegisterPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with status display and automatic redirect upon successful login.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app requirements, architecture notes, known deployment issues, and the list of implemented features with their versions.
